*****************
Command *rmpath*
*****************

Documentation for the rmpath command in */trans/cmds/rmpath.c*.

Command
=======

See: `Command: addpath </command/addpath.html>`_ `Command: showpath </command/showpath.html>`_ 

USAGE::

	rmpath <directory>

This command will remove a path from your current exec paths.
